# username

**Type Property**

A property that defines the content in a text input area as an account or login name.

## Declaration

```swift
static let username: UITextContentType
```

## Managing accounts

- **password**: A property that defines the content in a text input area as a password.
- **newPassword**: A property that defines the content in a text input area as a new password.

items.description: A property that defines the content in a text input area as a new password.
